body:
So you think your good? Tell me below and expose those rhymes, show what skill you have fighting all the time.

Hey it's me Spiritmage123 here
You probably thinkin' I'm bad just cuz you've never seen me
Mate your number 2 and you can't stop that, cuz when I'm busting rhymes
you think I'm using a mad hack!

Don't hate, worship and look at me
Capturing those monuments all the time in PvP,
You think you're good, but think again for now I have
busted your brains out (again).

title: Avicus Freestyle Rap Battle

replies.body:
Sweet dollar ice tea from McDonalds,
I drink that

Supa hot fire,
I spit that

Two and a Half Men,
I watch that

But I'm not a rapper

replies.body:
Do you called that a rhyme
I think you are wasting my time
You think you are a threat
but you are just a silhouette\
I'll defend anything effectively
but you can't get anything objectively

Your move good sir

replies.body:
Check me out.

Ice cream trucks, I chase that.

Two shoes, I lace that.

The weather, I check that.

But I'm not a rapper.

*On a serious note, I'm a terrible rapper, so I can't come up with anything. :/

replies.body: To be honest. It's pretty hard to rap here on the internet. We can't hear the feeling behind it or, how you phrase the words.
